fallacies.df.Topic: Are humans to blame for certain animal extinctions?
fallacies.df.Text: Yes, human beings have hunted and eaten animals for as long as can be shown and they are partly to blame for certain animal extinctions.

fallacies.df.Text: Humans are not to be blamed for animal extinction.
